intent_atoms.description: Establish the isoinspector executable target and root command using swift-argument-parser so downstream streaming commands can share consistent infrastructure.
The isoinspector executable target and root command must be established using swift-argument-parser.
Downstream streaming commands (Task D2) rely on the consistent infrastructure provided by the isoinspector root command.
Implement inspect and validate commands once the CLI scaffolding is complete.
The inspect and validate commands must be implemented after completion of Task D1.
Task D2 cannot proceed until Task D1 is completed.
Build a SwiftUI app shell with document browser and recents list once the CLI scaffolding stabilizes and foundation C1 is completed.
The SwiftUI app shell must be built after the CLI scaffolding stabilizes and the foundation C1 is completed.
E1 depends on completed C1 foundation.
Configure performance benchmarks for large files once the parsing pipeline from Phase B is stabilized and streaming fixtures delivered.
The benchmark configuration must be done after the parsing pipeline has been stable …

functional_units.name: isoinspector CLI executable
functional_units.description: Provides a command-line interface executable named isoinspector that serves as the root command for downstream streaming commands.

functional_units.name: inspect command
functional_units.description: Command to inspect data streams or files, part of the CLI functionality.

functional_units.name: validate command
functional_units.description: Command to validate data streams or files, part of the CLI functionality.

functional_units.name: SwiftUI app shell
functional_units.description: Graphical user interface built with SwiftUI that includes a document browser and recents list for managing documents.
